product_name: Cleanwaste WAG BAG Toilet in a Bag Waste Kit
long_description: Tread lightly on the land with the Cleanwaste WAG BAG(R) Toilet in a Bag(TM) waste kit. Kit contains a WAG BAG waste bag, zip-close storage bag, toilet paper and hand sanitizer. Disposal bags contain environmentally friendly Poo Powder(TM) that quickly turns human waste into a solid for easy transport and safe disposal. Poo Powder treats up to 32 oz. of liquid and solid waste, allowing for multiple uses per bag. Odor neutralizer eliminates unpleasant odors; decay catalyst initiates decomposition. Landfill-approved WAG BAG waste bags are biodegradable and can be disposed of in trash with regular garbage.
short_description: Tread lightly on the land with the Cleanwaste WAG BAG(R) Toilet in a Bag(TM) waste kit.
